term.title: attractive–mixed–repulsive classification

item.text: A classification of potential-energy surfaces in which a highly attractive surface is at one extreme and a highly repulsive surface is at the other. The energy release in intermediate cases is referred to as mixed.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 149. 'A glossary of terms used in chemical kinetics, including reaction dynamics (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 153 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668010149)
